Articles.Content: If i add a mod midgame, will I get all the mod parts automaticly researched if i researched the research the appear in?Just asking to make sure I cant fck up my save. I got pretty far where I am.

All parts in nodes on the tech-tree you have already unlocked should be unlocked. But the best course in pretty much all situation like this to simply back-up your save and try. If your save gets screwed you delete it and restore the back-up.

Experiment, try, fail and eventually succeed.  It really is not that hard. Just make sure you think before you act.

yeah, thats what i figured. Thank you!
